title: Average player age of participating national teams at the 2018 World Cup in Russia
summary: This bar chart has 32 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Average player age in years in each Country on the y axis.
The maximum Average player age in years 29.6 is found at Country Costa Rica and the minimum is found at Nigeria where Country is 25.9.
The difference of Average player age in years between the highest and lowest Country is 3.7.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Average player age in years in the y axis.
Country Costa Rica has the highest Average player age in years and Nigeria has the lowest Average player age in years.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 32 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Average player age in years in each Country on the y axis.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Average player age in years in the y axis.
The Average player age in years is appeared to be the highest at Country Costa Rica and lowest at Country Nigeria.
The highest Country Costa Rica has 3.7 more Average player age in years than the lowest Country Nigeria.
Average player age in years at Country Costa Rica is 29.6 , second place is  at 29.6, and thirdly is Argentina at 29.3.
Country Sweden, Uruguay, Colombia, and Australia have a similar Average player age in years that is 28.1.
The highest value 29.6 at Costa Rica is almost 1.06 times larger than the average value 27.86.
The Average player age in years is 891.6 if we add up values of all Countrys.
